GSD.description:
gpu: lontium-lt9611: Fix NULL pointer dereference in lt9611_connector_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit a29f7427041a943484f916157c43c46d3bbf25d4. For more details please see the references link.
